title: Railworks TS2014 BR Class 52
description:
The Class 52 Ã¢â‚¬â€œ officially licensed by the Diesel Traction Group Ã¢â‚¬â€œ for Train Simulator is a former Iron Horse House model, which has been updated to TS2014 standard, including new scenarios and improved exterior modelling. The locomotive recreates Western Champion as seen today operating rail tours, and is available in BR Western Region Red livery including BR chocolate and cream Mk1 coaching stock. 

The locomotive is also Quick Drive compatible, giving you the freedom to drive the BR Class 52 on any Quick Drive enabled route for Train Simulator. Also included are scenarios specifically for The Riviera Line: Exeter-Paignton route (available separately and required to play these scenarios).




Please support the developers and buy some of their content if you can afford it.


Please use the email address or the facebook fanpage for requests, questions and also if you want to share an addon with the community which we will post on your behalf.

If you would like to contribute, please read the Readme.pdf.




A Team tpb_4_ever upload.
